author: Telegraph Staff
title: Win a £350 holiday voucher
text:
Travel Win a £350 holiday voucher Tell us about visiting the remains of ancient civilisations for the chance to win a £350 DialAFlight voucher Send us your travel tips to win a holiday voucher Photo: Alamy 8:00AM BST 20 Sep 2015 
Tell us about ancient sites and ruins you have visited, from the Acropolis in Greece and the Mayan sites of Central America to the moai of Easter island or the temples of Angkor Wat in Cambodia. The reader who sends in the best entry will win a £350 travel voucher. 
DialAFlight 
DialAFlight (0844 556 6060; dialaflight.com ) is one of the UK’s top travel companies, offering tailor-made travel to destinations throughout the world. Whether you’re looking to fly to the Caribbean, long for a round-the-world adventure or are simply seeking a short break, DialAFlight’s 300-strong team of travel managers can assist. No travel itinerary is too big or too complicated and DialAFlight prides itself on offering some of the most competitively-priced air fares in the industry. DialAFlight also offers fabulous deals on hotels, escorted tours and car hire. 
The prize 
Win a £350 travel voucher to spend on a holiday with DialAFlight. Choose from a wide range of trips and flights to worldwide destinations including Africa, Asia, Canada, the Caribbean, New Zealand, Australia, India or the USA. 
Experience five-star Antigua with a 40 per cent saving at Carlisle Bay , where a stunning spa and water sports are on offer as well as great dining options. Seven nights b&b (two sharing) costs from £1,599 per person including flights (London) with departures from May 2-June 24 2016. Or why not see bucket-list Asia on the Cambodia and Vietnam Explorer Tour , with a 10 per cent saving? You’ll explore Halong Bay, the Mekong delta, Angkor Wat and the cities of Ho Chi Minh (Saigon), Hanoi, Hoi An and Hue. The tour costs from £2,099 per person and includes flights (London), 13 nights’ b&b (two sharing), all local transport, guides and entrance fees. Depart between October 1 and December 2 2015. 
Submissions 
Email your entries (no more than 150 words, please) with your name, address and telephone number, by midnight on Wednesday September 23 2015, to yoursay@telegraph.co.uk. The £350 DialAFlight voucher can be used for travel departing within a year of the competition date, subject to availability. It is redeemable against one booking only (international travel only), made within six months of the competition date. The prize is non-transferable and no cash alternative is available. Only one prize voucher can be won per person per year. All bookings are subject to DialAFlight’s booking terms and conditions (see dialaflight.com). Other terms and conditions apply. Email yoursay@telegraph.co.uk for details.
